title: How to Make Lemonade
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 541 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 620L
description: There's nothing like cold, tasty lemonade on a hot day! And this book will tell you exactly how to make it, all by yourself! Just gather all your ingredients and follow the steps, and soon you will be drinking your own homemade lemonade! Can you taste it already? Photographs reinforce the steps in preparing it.
